title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local models from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Use Llama 3, Phi-3, etc. inside LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Manage models, chats, documents, users in one place.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama’s REST API for Rails apps. Generate or chat in one line.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama built with Python Prompt Toolkit. Syntax highlighting, history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset. Use local Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, embeddings, fine-tuning, Docker, Kubernetes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD, Open WebUI, RAG, nginx SSL.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma. Upload PDFs and chat locally.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with Llama 3, Mistral, etc. through Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that streams Ollama responses in threads. Add custom system prompts.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama. GenServer-based with Telemetry and retry logic.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to chat with Ollama from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers over Ollama’s REST API with typed models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama. Zero-dependency HTTP and JSON parsing for native binaries.
